publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7800 Jim Mather: The Energy Act 2008 (Storage of Carbon Dioxide) (Scotland) Regulations 2011—That the Economy, Energy and Tourism Committee recommends that the Energy Act 2008 (Storage of Carbon Dioxide) (Scotland) Regulations 2011 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*

S3M-7800 Jim Mather: The Energy Act 2008 (Storage of Carbon Dioxide) (Scotland) Regulations 2011—That the Economy, Energy and Tourism Committee recommends that the Energy Act 2008 (Storage of Carbon Dioxide) (Scotland) Regulations 2011 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney
